alert.note: Alert for Butte, Blackfoot Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 01 at 9:04PM MST until February 02 at 3:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Low visibility in blowing snow. Widespread ice covered roadways. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Butte, Georgetown Lake, Highway 12 Garrison to Elliston, Homestake Pass, and MacDonald Pass. * WHEN...Until 3 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
